title: Tease
description: I should have never responded to that first message. She was baiting me. Playing with me like a mouse entertains a cat. She batted at me and strung me along until I was powerless to her charms. Now all I could do was think about the little minx whose name I didn't even know. This book is suggested for 18+ because the Professor and his minx sure like to get naughty!
author: Jenna Thalia
